subscription_alternative.monthly_limit: Higher usage limits than free tier, with caps on GPT-4o messages during peak hours.
Approx. 5x more usage than free tier, with a message limit on Claude 3.5 Sonnet.

pricing_analysis.trend: Aggressive price drops with new model releases (e.g., GPT-4o vs. GPT-4 Turbo), a clear 'sweet spot' emerging at the $3-5 / 1M input token price point for top-tier intelligence. Subscription models are solidifying as the primary consumer access method.
